<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Given a compound construct with a set of clauses, generate the list of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constituent leaf constructs, each with a list of clauses that apply to it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: Clauses that are not originally present, but that are implied by the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OpenMP spec are materialized, and are present in the output.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: Composite constructs will also be broken up into leaf constructs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If composite constructs require processing as a whole, the lists of clauses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for each leaf constituent should be merged.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// directives that allow it, or if there is more that one, do not apply</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// anything and return false, otherwise return true.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If such a directive does not exist, return false, otherwise return true.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// From &quot;OpenMP Application Programming Interface&quot;, Version 5.2:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// S Some clauses are permitted only on a single leaf construct of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// S combined or composite construct, in which case the effect is as if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// S the clause is applied to that specific construct. (p339, 31-33)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;5.2:340:21-30&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (21) The effect of the lastprivate clause is as if it is applied to all leaf</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constructs that permit the clause.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (22) If the parallel construct is among the constituent constructs and the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// list item is not also specified in the firstprivate clause, then the effect</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the lastprivate clause is as if the shared clause with the same list item</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is applied to the parallel construct.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (24) If the teams construct is among the constituent constructs and the list</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// item is not also specified in the firstprivate clause, then the effect of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lastprivate clause is as if the shared clause with the same list item is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// applied to the teams construct.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (27) If the target construct is among the constituent constructs and the list</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// item is not the base variable or base pointer of a list item that appears in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a map clause, the effect of the lastprivate clause is as if the same list</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// item appears in a map clause with a map-type of tofrom.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
